Title: Eliminates the requirement under the security guard act of full-time employment for peace officers
Summary: Eliminates the requirement under the security guard act of full-time employment for peace officers.
LawCode: Amd ยง89-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the definition of the term "peace officer" as such term is used in provisions of law relating to security guards
